content.text: Asahija is a Marine Chief Petty Officer stationed in the West Blue or Grand Line whose shadow was stolen by Gecko Moria.
Asahija has the normal Marine soldier appearance. He wears the standard Marine uniform along with Marine hat.
Asahija seemed really overjoyed to a point where tears formed in his eyes, when he saw his shadow that was stolen from him by Moria has returned.
Asahija was first seen after Straw Hats defeated Gecko Moria and returned all the stolen shadows to their rightful owners. Asahija was overjoyed to see his shadow back again.

elements.text: ↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 50 Chapter 483 and Episode 375, Asahija overjoyed at the return of his shadow.
↑  One Piece Blue Deep: Characters World (p. 214), Asahija's name and rank is revealed.
